title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 19 ยง 1107.7 - Qualifying course credit for continuing education
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 19 ยง 1107.7 - Qualifying course credit for continuing education

State Regulations

An individual who successfully completes a qualifying
appraiser course during any license term in anticipation of changing its
appraiser classification may receive continuing education credit for such a
course. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 19
ยง
1107.7

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
